tool_description: This API returns full information about SSL certificate used by a host.
name: SSL Certificate Checker
title: SSL Certificate Checker

api_list.name: /ssl-certificate-checker/check
api_list.description: Check the validity of an SSL certificate, returns certificate information.

api_list.name: /ssl-certificate-checker/health
api_list.description: Return the health status of the API. Returns current UTC time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-certificate-checker2.p.rapidapi.com/ssl-certificate-checker/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-certificate-checker2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
